label: 縣
著者: Ambros, Barbara . Junko Ruppert Onosaka . Langford, Drake . Ron, Roy . Ruppert, Brian . Van Put, Ineke
説明文: See also Agata (県). An early designation of provincial lands that provided income for the court. The term was used before the Taika Reforms (645A.D.) under the rule of the Yamato court. It is metioned in the Kojiki, Nihon shoki, and Manyōshū. Also pronounced akata." [大化の改新、大和、古事記、日本書紀、万葉集]"
